Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AlertBox
    The type Alert box.
    BaseController
    Controller of the generic base scene, show a the Player Board with all the info updates about the player
    BaseMeController
    Controller of the client player base scene, show a the Player Board, LeaderCards with all the info updates about the player clietn Entry point for the begin of the turn
    ChoseResController
    Controller for chose resources pane.
    ControllerGuiInterface
    Controller Gui interface Abstract class, each JavaFx controller inherits from this class in order to be managed by GUI class Each class that inherits must have an unique static attribute className of type String *
    DashboardController
    Dashboard controller, controller of the Dashboard, show all card on sell and your depots on the right Accessible even if it's not player's turn
    EndGameController
    Controller of the pane showed at the end of the game Show players rank and allow just to exit from the game
    GUI
    The Gui class Extends Application Implements UI There are some static function used in Gui Controllers to avoid code duplicate
    InitialController
    Controller of the chose initial leader card pane
    InitialResController
    Controller of the pane to chose initial Resources
    IntermediateController
    Generic controller for a Pane with the player's depots on the left and a set of choiceBox for the resources on the right When overiding update methods ensure to call super in order to guarantee Good updating of default elements of the pane
    LobbyController
    The type Lobby controller.
    MarketController
    The type Market controller.
    PrivateLoginController
    The Private login controller.
    PublicLoginController
    The type Public login controller.Show a pane that allows user to join a public room
    SingleLoginController
    The type Single login cotroler.Show a pane that allows user to join a public room
    StartController  
    StoreResourcesController
    The type Store resources controller.
    WaitingController
    The type Waiting controller.
    WhiteController
    The type White controller.
